price: Reci: “On vas je po Zemlji razasuo i pred Njim ćete biti sakupljeni.”
arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul huwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
